title: Google Adds MyShake Into Android OS
author: Rhonda Shrader
excerpt: National NSF I-Corps team MyShake recently had its California earthquake early warning system added into Android phones. Based out of the Berkeley Seismological Labs, MyShake used the National program to pivot from a B2C to B2B model. Their lessons learned have clearly had an impact in making our world safer.
